name: breeze-client
description: Breeze data management for JavaScript clients

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run packagr && npm pack ./dist && npm run install-to-spec
scripts.clean: rimraf temp && rimraf src/*.js* && rimraf src/*.d.ts && rimraf ./*.d.ts && rimraf dist && rimraf node_modules/breeze-client.js
scripts.install-to-spec: cd spec && npm uninstall breeze-client && npm install ../breeze-client-2.0.6.tgz
scripts.typedoc: typedoc --out ./temp/docs/ --exclude xx  --excludePrivate --excludeNotExported  --tsConfig ./tsconfig.typedoc.json --mode file --readme ./readme.doc.md ./src/breeze.ts && node tools/copyIfDifferent.js temp/docs docs
